# SkeletalPosesComponent

**Structure**

A component that exposes the collection of named animation skeletal poses.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SkeletalPosesComponent
```

## Overview

Use the entity’s skeletal poses to either read the pose evaluated from animations bound to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindTarget/jointTransforms] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindTarget/skeletalPose(_:)], or write your own pose to animate the skeletal model.

### Setting updated value on an entity

When an updated [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose] is set on an entity as part of this component, these rules are followed:

- If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointNames] is reordered, following animation updated will match the new order.
- If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointTransforms] contains more elements than [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointNames], the extra transformations are ignored.
- If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointTransforms] contains less elements than [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointNames], the extra joint transformations are not updated.

You can use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPosesComponent/poses]’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPoseSet/default] accessor for the same skeletal pose as exposed by [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasModel/jointNames] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasModel/jointTransforms]. The access trough the component allows the reordering, addition and removal of joints from the default pose.

## Initializers

- **init(poses:)**: Creates a component value with the provided poses.

## Instance Properties

- **poses**: The collection of the skeletal poses for a single entity.

## Skeletons

- **SkeletalPose**: A container that holds the position and orientation of each joint in a single animation skeleton.
- **SkeletalPoseSet**: A collection of named skeletal poses.

## Conforms To

- Component
